articles.title: U.S. revokes visa for president of Colombia after he urges American soldiers to disobey Trump - CBS News
articles.description: The State Department announced it was revoking a visa for Colombia President Gustavo Petro after he participated in a New York protest where he called on American soldiers to disobey President Trump's orders.
articles.content: Tensions between the United States and Colombia have escalated with the State Department announcing it was revoking a visa for Gustavo Petro, president of the Latin American country, after he partici… [+2847 chars]

articles.author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert, Alex Bitter
articles.title: Starbucks is closing over 100 North American stores — here are the locations we know so far - Business Insider
articles.description: Starbucks on Thursday said it would close 1% of its North American stores, but didn't announce which ones. Business Insider has compiled a list.
articles.content:
When Starbucks announced on Thursday that it would shutter more than 100 coffeehouse locations across North America, the company didn't publicly specify which stores would close.
